phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
A Menos appeared and he defeated it.
This news will eventually reach the Soul Society.
What is the big idea so early in the morning?
You had a realization or something?
It is what your sister did!
A washing was enough, but she went and!
Yuzu must have felt sorry'cuz you were so dirty.
She even put this ornament on my ear!
She thinks I am just a stuffed toy andOwwee!
I thought it would come off if I pulled hard enough.
I think your ear'll come off first.
Why am I the only one who is always treated like this?!
Well then, I will leave on a journey.
And I will find the one who will be kind to me!
The place where I truly belong!
Hey Rukia, time to leave for school!
I am just tired from yesterday's incident.
So I stormed out of the house.
I have no money, so I cannot go that far.
Girls cannot resist picking up a cute stuffed animal.
It just spoke, did not it?
I guess it cannot be helped in a case like this
Ryo Kunieda, Karakura High School Track Team.
I run the 100 meters in 12 seconds flat!
All I wanted was some kindness!
But you really come early, do not you?
It is almost summer vacation, right?
I kept thinking about it and cannot sleep, like, sparkle!
Kuchiki, do you have any plans for the summer?
There is a huge Fireworks Festival in August.
Tatsuki and the others, we are all planning to go together.
It will be like the time we all went to the Burarei program.
I just know it will be fun.
But he came along just for his family, he can be very kind.
He has such a fun family, he should lighten up a bit more.
Kurosaki has a permanent frown on his face.
I thought you did not care too much for Kurosaki.
When you take a good look at him, he has an interesting face.
Please come to the Fireworks Festival with us.
I found you, my goddess Orihime
First, I will lie there helpless in front of Orihime.
Like the Holy Mother, she is sure to hold me gently,
So cute! and cuddle me in the Valley of the Gods!
My target has always been Orihime!
Once decided, you must act quickly!
And then, soft, warm cuddles await
This is not supposed to happen!
Yakka = soccer and baseball  Orihime, I think your game of Yakka  is not fair to the defense.
And a one-run lead is not because for a celebration yet!
Let us call it a day.
I was just getting warmed up!
You were looking at Inoue, were not you?
We are healthy high school boys!
What is wrong with being interested in cute girls?!
There is nothing wrong with that.
Quit fooling around and start helping over here!
That is the last of it.
Ishida has not come by yet today.
At Central Park, mumbling to himself.
He always acts like he is in a drama.
I will bet he is in some theater group.
There were some weird men around him, too.
And there was even an explosion... it was pretty wild.
God, thank you for making him such an idiot!
Hmm...well anyway, take your seat, and let us continue class.
Do not let it bother you.
I-I would not worry about injuries like that.
I said do not let it bother you.
I cannot believe that Ishida was that late...
Sure, but can I invite someone else, too?
Eating with a guy like that cannot be fun at all!
Were those bandages that funny, Ichigo?!
I have been suspected from the very beginning.
There is probably not much time left.
Rukia, come and join us for lunch!
Jinta, get serious and sweep properly.
This is the age when men are silent and play soccer!
Its name is Yoruichi and it is the Boss's best friend.
A cat as a best friend?
I feel sorry for the Boss sometimes.
I guess you could say that.
T-This is such a painful lunch!
It is like we are cursed.
Oh, it is only you, Chad.
Hey Keigo, say something to cheer us up.
If you are going to get so moody, you should not have asked Ishida!
Say, I ate saury in Meguro recently.
Kurosaki, why did you invite me?
Out of sympathy for these wounds?
If that is the case, it is misplaced.
And I do not care to be pitied.
I just felt like it...that is all.
I did not ask you because I like you.
So just be grateful I asked at all.
As if I would be grateful!
Besides, I prefer to eat alone.
I like to be alone when I eat, too.
Why should I be the one to look away?
Castella sponge cake with bean jelly is the ultimate for sweets lovers.
Orihime, how come she can eat such things and not gain weight?
All the nutrients are going to her breasts, that is why.
Just what is your relationship with Kurosaki?
Mahana, that was way too bold!
You are the ones who want to know, but cannot ask.
So I popped the question for you.
You do not care for Ichigo anyway, Michiru.
Well, it is not that I do not like him.
His face just looks a bit scary.
I think he has an interesting face.
When did you get over your fear of Kurosaki?
You do not feel anything for him?
If you like Kurosaki, then I would have to start liking him...
and Tatsuki can start liking him...
and why do not we all start liking him?
Then it would have been a sure win for the girl's team!
This kid is starting her nonsensical rambling again!
A group competition from the start sounds interesting.
But I want Orihime's first happy face to be all mine!
Let us begin with a one-on-one relationship!
That was not a parry, it was a punch!
with a new concoction with bean jam...
So let us eat it together, all right?
Err... I will think about it.
You keep saying, I will think about it.
Why do I have to be treated like this?!
I will use the deadly weapons that weird manager has collected here
Just because you are also one of the cat family,
do not put me in the same class as you!
Mod Souls can even enter stuffed toys.
You are that cat from earlier!
What will we do with you?
Yeah, there is nothing wrong with me.
Is there going to be another one like yesterday?
What would we do if a Menos Grande appeared so easily?
You are...acting a bit strange today.
I realize that my place is with you!
The world was so cruel to this one who ran away from home.
I am going back to your room!
But he is really become attached to you.
He is a pain in the neck.
Look, you have stuffing coming out.
I am amazed he did not die.
Oh well, we will take you to him.
I thought this is your specialty.
I do not need to answer that.
Cannot do a thing with those hands!
Cannot even thread a needle like that, huh?
This is a piece of cake for me!
I have high-grade fabric so that I can accept orders at any time.
And the material I used here-
I am going to run away, after all!
Stop putting on an act, Kisuke.
Will you talk about it before or after your milk?
Geez, she went off somewhere again.
She is actually in a Gigai...
I did not think the data from the Visuals Department was reliable.
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I was casually walking through town
Around the time dusk fell and the city was bathed in red
It was an afternoon with crowds of people coming and going
I do not know why but I just stood there and watched
Then my cell phone started to vibrate and I made myself move
hoping it could fill in this hole in my heart
We got to hold each other up
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I am Ishida, president of the Handicrafts Club.
I just want to say one thing...
this episode did not showcase all of my talent.
If I had more time, I could have come up with a more fashionable look.
In time, I will show you my work that will make your spine tingle.
